alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 4:09AM MST until January 05 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT MST FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches (mainly in Mission Valley and south end of Flathead Lake). For the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Flathead Lake, Flathead Valley, Mission Valley, and Polson. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 3 PM MST this afternoon. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight tonight to midnight MST Friday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
